titleStmt.title: SII 5.464: original edition by H. Krishna Sastri
No. 464. (A.R. No. 171 of 1894). ON THE SAME WALL.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . tiru maṉṉi vaḷara Irunila maṭantaiyum poṟcayap pāvaiyuñ cirtta
ṉic celviyun taṉ perunteviyarāki Iṉpuṟu neṭutuya rūḻiyuḷ Iṭaituṟainā
ṭun tuṭarvaṉavelippaṭar vaṉavāciyuñ cuḷḷic cūḻ matiṭ koḷḷippākkaiyu naṇṇaṟ karumura
ṇ maṇṇaikkaṭakkamum porutaṭa rīḻattaraiyarta muṭiyum Āṅkavaṉ ṟeviya roṅkeḻil muṭiyu
m muṉṉavarpakkaṟ ṟeṉṉavar vaitta cun=tara muṭiyum Intira nāramu n=teṇṭirai yiḻamaṇṭala muḻuva
tum Eṟipaṭaik keraḷar muṟaimaiyiṟ cūṭuṅ kulataṉamākiya palarpukaḻ muṭiyuñ ceṅkatir
mmālaiyuñ caṅkatirvelait tolperuṅkāval palpaḻa n=ti vuñ ceruviṟ ciṉavi lirupattoru
kā laraicukaḷai kaṭṭa paraicurāmaṉ melvaruñ cān=ti mattivaraṇ karuti Iruttiya cempoṟ ṟiruttaku
muṭiyum payaṅkoṭu paḻimika muyaṅkiyil mutukiṭ ṭoḷitta cayaciṅkaṉ Aḷapperum pukaḻoṭu piṭi
yar Iraṭṭapāṭi Eḻaraiyilakkamu ṉavaṉatik kulapperu malaikaḷum vikkiramavira cakkarakoṭṭamu mutur
paṭavalla maturamaṇṭalamum kāmiṭaivaḷa nāmaṇaikkoṇayum veñciṉavirap pañcap
paḷḷiyum pācaṭai paḻaṉa mācuṇitecamu mayarvil vaṇkīrtti Ayā tinakarayiṟ can=ti
ra n=tolkula ttin=tirataraṉai viḷaiyamarkkaḷattukkiḷaiyoṭum piṭittu palataṉatto
ṭu niṟai kulataṉak kuvaiyuṅ kiṭṭaruñceṟimiḷai Oṭṭaviṣaiyamum pūcuracer nalkocalainā
ṭu n=taṉmapālaṉai vemmuṉai yaḻittu vaṇṭuṟaicolai taṇṭaputtiyum Iraṇacūraṉai muṟaṇu
ṟat tākkit tikkaṇa kīrttit takkaṇalāṭamum kovin=ta can=taṉ māviḻin=toṭa t=taṅkāta cāra
l vaṅkāḷatecamu n=to ṭukaṭaṟ caṅkoṭṭar mahipālaṉai veñcamar viḷākattañ
cuvittaruḷi Oṇṭiṟaliyāṉaiyum peṇṭir paṇṭāramu nittila neṭuṅkaṭaluttiralāṭa
mu veṟimalarttirtta tteṟipuṉaṟ kaṅkaiyum Alaikaṭal naṭuvuṭ palakalañ celittic
caṅgrāma vijayattuṅkapaṉmanākiya kiṭārattaraiyaṉai vākaiyamporukaṭaṟ kumpa
kkariyoṭu makappaṭap piṭit turimaiyiṟ piṟakkiya perunetip piṟakkamum Ārttava ṉa
kāaṉakar porttoḻil vācalil viccātira toraṇamu moyttoḷir puṉamaṇip putavamuṅ kaṉa
maṇik katavamu n=tuṟainirp paṉṉaiyu maṉmalaivāraiyiṟ ṟeṉmalaiyūrum Āḻkaṭa lakaḻcūḻ māji
riṭiṅkamuṅ kalaṅkā valviṉai yilaṅkācokamum kāppuṟu niṟaipuṉal māppappāḷamuṅ kāvalam
puricai mevilimpaṅkamum viḷaippan=tūruṭai vaḷaippan=tūṟum kalāmuri kkaṭun=tiṟa lilā
muritecamuṅ kalaittakkor pukaḻ talaittakkolamu n=titamāvalviṉai mātamaliṅkamu n=te ṉakkavārpo
ḻil māṉakkavāramu n=toṭukaṭaṟkāvaṟ kaṭumuraṭ kaṭāramu māpporu taṇṭāṟ koṇṭa kopparakesarivarmmarāna
Uṭaiyār śrīraājendracoḻadevarkku yāṇṭu patināṟāvatu jayaṅkoṇṭacoḻamaṇṭilattu kaḷattūr
kkoṭṭattu n=taṉkūṟṟut tirukkaḻukkuṉṟamāṉa Ulakaḷan=ta coḻapurattu śrīmulasthānattu U
ṭaiyār decaviṭaṅkadevarkku Āmurkkoṭṭattu māmalapuramākiya caṉaṉātapurattuc caṅkarappāṭiyā
ṉ koḷḷampākkiḻāṉ mātevaṉ Eṭṭi vaitta tirunun=tā viḷak koṉṟiṉāl Āṭu toṇṇūṟu
śrīmūlasthānamuṭaiya mahādevarkku Ivvūr vyāpāri Iḷavākai poṉṉālai pukaḻākki vaitta viḷakkarai
Ivvaraiviḷakkiṉukku Āṭu 4 10 5 Innakarattār vaitta viḷakkaraiyiṉuk kāṭu 4 10 5 Ivvūrc caṅkarapāṭiyāṉ
teṉṉavaṉaṭi vaitta viḷakkarai tecaviṭaṅkatevarkku Āṭu 4 10 5 kaḷattūrkoṭṭattu vallanāṭṭup pe
run=ta ṇṭalattuk
koṉuḻāṉ ta
ṇṭi Iṉṉampa
ṉ Uṭaiyār de
caviṭaṅkadevar
kku vaitta tiru
nun=tā viḷak
kiṉukku Āṭu
toṇṇūṟu
Iddharmmam patmā
heśvara ra
kṣai .
Digital edition of SII 5.464 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
